questions.questionText: In which part of the HTML metadata is contained?
questions.explanation: The body tag defines documentâ€™s body. A title tag is an HTML element which specifies the title of a web page.

questions.questionText: 404 HTTP error is generated due to ____________

options.text: slow loading of the web page.

questions.explanation: HTTP 404 is an error that indicates that the client was able to communicate with the server but the server could not find the request.

questions.questionText: Which element is used for or styling HTML5 layout?
questions.explanation: For styling HTML5, CSS i.e Cascading Style Sheet is used.

questions.questionText: Which of the following HTML tag is used to create an unordered list?
questions.explanation: <ul> tag is used to create the unordered list items in an HTML document. By default, unordered list items will display in a bulleted format.
